headline: NordTech Issues Profit Warning Amid Supply Snag
summary: NordTech cut its FY guidance due to a halted component shipment.
body: NordTech Plc lowered its full-year revenue outlook after a key supplier in Taiwan halted shipments. Management expects a 7% revenue shortfall if the disruption extends beyond two weeks.

headline: NordTech Supplier Fire Forces Production Halt
summary: A fire at wafer plant MegaFab may impact Nordic hardware makers.
body: MegaFab, a key wafer provider, confirmed a fire in its clean room late Thursday. NordTech sources say contingency inventories cover only four days of orders.

headline: NordTech CEO: Evaluating Air Freight to Bridge Supply Gap
summary: Management explores expedited shipping and alternate fabs.
body: On an investor call, NordTech CEO Anna Lindholm said the firm will reroute production to European fabs and consider air freight contracts. Guidance will be revisited within ten days.

headline: Bank of Andesia Hints at Faster Rate Cuts After Inflation Miss
summary: The central bank says disinflation is broadening.
body: After headline CPI undershot forecasts for the third month, the Bank of Andesia signaled it may accelerate rate cuts, citing easing wage pressures.

headline: Traders Flag ETF Outflows After Andesia CPI Miss
summary: Flows from the ADEX sovereign ETF accelerate in early trading.
body: Community posts on FinChat showed retail investors rotating out of the ADEX Sovereign Bond ETF as yields fell on expectations of quicker rate cuts.

headline: Macro Funds Add Duration on Andesia Dovish Turn
summary: Asset managers snapped up 10Y Andesia bonds.
body: Several macro-focused funds disclosed adding Andesia 10-year paper following the central bank briefing, betting on a faster easing cycle.
